name: This is Jon (Cedrik Rocha)
description:
This is JON.

A simple game about the math of life.

The game was not finished in time, but we will publish it as soon as it is released.

Voice - Taneko - @tanekoshima (Twitter)
Game designer - Cedrik Rocha  - @cedrikrocha ( Twitter)
Programmer -  Kordeyrow
Sound Designer - Rodrigo Passos
